description.en: Delete an event from your Google Calendar. This action cannot be undone.
description.de: Lösche einen Eintrag aus deinem Google Kalender. Diese Aktion kann nicht rückgängig gemacht werden.

vars.ACCESS_TOKEN: env:GOOGLE_CALENDAR_ACCESS_TOKEN|OAuth 2.0 access token from Google. Get it from Google Cloud Console after OAuth authentication.

inputs.name: Calendar ID
inputs.description: The calendar ID containing the event to delete. Use 'primary' for your primary calendar.
inputs.bot: The calendar ID. Use 'primary' for the user's primary calendar, or the calendar email address for other calendars.

inputs.name: Event ID
inputs.description: The ID of the event to delete.
inputs.bot: The event ID from Google Calendar. You can get this from the event's details or from listing events.

inputs.name: Send Updates
inputs.description: Whether to send notifications about the event deletion. Options: 'all', 'externalOnly', 'none'.
inputs.bot: Whether to send notifications to attendees. Use 'all' to notify all attendees, 'externalOnly' for external attendees only, or 'none' for no notifications.
